channel.title: Comments on: Say Goodbye to Hollywood …

item.title: By: Charles Macquarie
item.dc:creator: Charles Macquarie
item.description: We'll miss you so much Jim! But I can't wait to hear more about all the fun things you have time for when you move on -- so many congrats.
item.content:encoded: We’ll miss you so much Jim! But I can’t wait to hear more about all the fun things you have time for when you move on — so many congrats.

item.title: By: Lisa Leiva
item.dc:creator: Lisa Leiva
item.description: Congratulations Jim! I am so excited for the next chapter in your life and all the adventures you are sure to have. I am sad to see you go but I am looking forward to celebrating with you when its time!
item.content:encoded: Congratulations Jim! I am so excited for the next chapter in your life and all the adventures you are sure to have. I am sad to see you go but I am looking forward to celebrating with you when its time!

item.title: By: Jason Hedrick
item.dc:creator: Jason Hedrick
item.description: Congratulations Jim! We will definitely be bummed to see you go, but we're stoked to have you for another 7-ish months!
item.content:encoded: Congratulations Jim! We will definitely be bummed to see you go, but we’re stoked to have you for another 7-ish months!

item.title: By: Kemi Amin
item.dc:creator: Kemi Amin
item.description: Bittersweet! Best on the journey ahead. Until then...see you tomorrow (ha!)
item.content:encoded: Bittersweet! Best on the journey ahead. Until then…see you tomorrow (ha!)
